# ChangeLog Version 1.1
## File-System/Locations
Translations/Localizations now have to be placed into the following directory: %AppData%\..\LocalLow\Colossal Order\Cities Skylines II\ModsData\TranslateCS2.Mod\
Settings can now be found over there: %AppData%\..\LocalLow\Colossal Order\Cities Skylines II\ModsSettings\TranslateCS2.Mod\
## Mod-Settings within the game
* removed behaviour -> add as source * removed clear overwritten * added drop down to select a flavor * if a certain language has no flavors, the drop down is disabled * if a flavor for a built in language is added, the drop down has an entry 'none'; this entry replaces the removed 'clear overwritten' * if a 'new' language is added, the drop down misses the entry 'none'
